Plot: In the tradition of Stephen King's 'Salem's Lot, Cirque Du Freak is the frightening saga of a young boy whose visit to a mysterious freak show leads him on a journey into a dark world of vampires. Filled with grotesque creatures, murderous vampires, and a petrifying ending, Cirque Du Freak will chill, thrill, and leave readers begging for more.
Characters: Darren Shan, Steve Leonard, Mr. Dalton, Dave Morgan, Sam White, Danny Curtain, Sheila Leigh, Tommy Jones, Alan Morris, Angela Shan, Dermot Shan, Annie Shan, Mrs. Quinn, Hibernius Tall, Wolf-Man, Alexander Ribs, Rhamus Twobellies, Hans Hands, Larten Crepsley, Madam Octa, Gertha Teeth, Sive, Seersa, Evra Von, Mrs. Leonard, Truska, Tony Morris
